description.lang: This is the Z-WaveTM plus Smoke Sensor, it supports security OTA with the newest features of the Z-Wave technology. Z-Wave is a wirelesscommunication protocol designed for home automation, specifically toremotely control applications in residential and light commercialenvironments. The technology uses a low-power RF radio embedded orretrofitted into home electronics devices and systems, such as lighting,home access control, entertainment systems and household appliances.
This group is for receiving the report message, like triggered event etc.
The interval time for auto report the battery level. 0 means turn off auto report battery. Each tick means 30 minutes. The default value is 12(6 hours).
The interval time for auto report the battery level.0 means turn off auto report battery. Each tick means 30 minutes. The default value is 12(6 hours).
Customer function switch, using bit control.Bit4: Notification Type,0: Using Notification Report. 1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
Bit4: Notification Type, 0: Using Notification Report.1: Using Sensor Binary Report.
